title: champ select
body: i am stuck in champ select wtf

replies.body: Yeah they have recognised the issue. There is a notification thing in the client now.

It's probably a sever issue. Same happened to me, tried logging out then back in, but it won't let you log back in.

Hopefully they'll post [here](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce) when it's fixed.
